intro: Kalbreyeriella, commonly known as the silverleaf daisy, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Asteraceae family and is characterized by its silvery-gray foliage and daisy-like yellow flowers. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and thrives in full sun. Kalbreyeriella is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its attractive appearance and drought tolerance. It is also valued for its ability to attract pollinators such as bees and butterflies.
